name: aml-experiments
description: The MUSCLE platform is an application that provides an easy way to implement and run online listening experiments for music research.
__comment1__: private set to true to suppress 'warning package.json: No license field'

scripts.test-front: sudo docker-compose run client yarn test --watchAll=false
scripts.test-back: sudo docker-compose run server bash -c 'python manage.py test'
